# Aurora X
Aurora X is a dark material-like theme with blue and purple tones.

## Installation
 1. Open Extensions on the sidebar
 2. Search for "**Aurora X**"
 3. Install it
 4. Reload the editor
 5. Press ⌘K + ⌘T
 6. Pick "**Aurora X**" one from the list and hit enter
 7. Enjoy! 

## ScreenShot
